channel.title: Portfolios on Follow Miaomiao
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Follow Miaomiao

item.title: Developer Documentation
item.description: Tools used: Markdown, VS Code, Oxygen This project involved updating a documentation set for developers who want to develop interactive online classroom apps using the provided SDK. The documentation set consists of release notes, quickstart guides, feature guides, API reference, etc. In addition to updating the documentation for new releases, I enriched the content of 50 topics by integrating feedback from both engineers and customer support. This round of content enhancement significantly reduced user-reported issues and tickets, thereby improving the overall user experience.

item.title: Enterprise Software Admin Guide
item.description: Tools used: Ixiasoft CCMS, Snagit, Microsoft PowerPoint A technical writing project for a human resource solution involved creating a new administrator guide consisting of over 30 topics. In addition to updating the documentation with the new features and changes for the following release, I also created a relationship diagram and an implementation flow chart with clickable hotpot, to help users to understand the solution’s workflow and navigate through the system more efficiently.
